did.unittitle: Samuel B. Ruggles abstract of title

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Abstract of title for New York City property owned by Samuel B. Ruggles, tracing the ownership of the land from 1674 to circa 1832. Included are copies of several wills, testaments, and maps of the property, which comprised the area between 15th Street on the south and 28th Street on the north, and the Bloomingdale and Old Post Roads on the west and First Avenue on the east.

acqinfo.p: Source and date of acquisition unknown. Formally accessioned in 1978.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Samuel Bulkley Ruggles (1800-1881) graduated from Yale College in 1814 and was a New York City lawyer. He was also a member of the New York State Legislature and a trustee of Columbia College.
